title: Fork, ca. 1690
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Two long straight tines, rounded shoulders, spiral-shaped neck. Brass ferrule, doubly waisted with a central plain octagonal moulding engraved with geometrical pattern. Tapering handle, octagonal in section; mother-of-pearl with engraved scrolled foliage, rounded top with writhen knop finial of brass.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1690.
ca. 1690. Steel, brass, mother-of-pearl. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-277-d.
